function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Correlational findings instead of causal findings","Impact":"Risk of drawing inaccurate conclusions and proposing ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct more experimental studies to confirm causal relationships","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Failure to consider other significant factors associated with infection rates","Impact":"Overlooking important contributors to infection rates and ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive studies to include other significant factors","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials"},{"Description":"Failure to account for the impact of vaccination programs on the relationship between green spaces and infection rates","Impact":"Unaccounted influence of vaccination rates on the relationship between green spaces and infection rates, leading to inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Study the influence of varying vaccination rates on the relationship between green spaces and infection rates","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials"}]}
